experience: You and Erwin both know Michael Fulcher, Scott Kelly, and 29 others

We’re on a mission to transform our country’s healthcare system.Each of our 1,700+ colleagues across the United States plays a role in transforming the lives of millions of Americans. This mission drives us - and it adds meaning to what we do, each and every day. Our passion for serving public health programs, and for engaging consumers more directly with the healthcare system, runs deep. Passion for what we do. Pride in how we do it.Cognosante was founded to address a critical gap in the health IT market – the need for a smart, nimble company, unencumbered by legacy systems and unafraid to challenge accepted wisdom. Experience grounds us; innovation drives us. For almost 30 years, we’ve worked to find progressive solutions to complex problems. We help state Medicaid agencies navigate healthcare reform. We provide community-based assistance to Americans as they enroll in healthcare coverage. And we dream of, design, and develop IT solutions meant to disrupt the status quo and connect the dots between patients, plans, providers, and payers. We are the best minds on health - and we’re looking to grow our team. Are you ready to make a difference in the lives of millions? Join us.
Sr. Technical Corporate Recruiter and Sourcer

Recruitment efforts cover all areas of IT, Software Engineering and Information Security including Delivery, Production Control, DevOps, System / Network Administrators, Full-Stack Software Engineering, SOC Analysts, Penetration Testers, Security Engineers and Security Architects,We are creating the future of payments by delivering innovative payment and risk solutions to financial institutions nationwide. For over 25 years, Early Warning has been a leader in financial technology that protects and advances the global financial system. Early Warning is owned and governed by seven of the largest banks in the United States, this unique business model facilitates a data exchange system based on collaborative intelligence and trusted exchange. We are growing our teams in Scottsdale, San Francisco, Chicago and Austin and are currently hiring for talented leaders and contributors in the areas of Cyber Security, Big Data, Web and Mobile Development, Risk and Fraud.  http://www.earlywarning.com/careers.htmlPlease feel free to contact me directly at erwin.deguzman@earlywarning.com if you are interested in any of our current openings.

•	Full life cycle recruitment (source, screen, submit, pipeline, etc),covering policies, guidelines and client objectives for both National VMS and retail accounts. •	As a HUB Recruiter covered national overflow IT and Engineering requirements from local branches and offices including Seattle, San Francisco, Phoenix, Dallas, South Carolina and East Coast markets.•	Full autonomy in working with Business Development and Account Managers to identify top accounts, target skill sets, key market segments, and to assess clients staffing requirements. •	Scheduled and conducted weekly client calls with HR Managers, hiring managers and executive decision makers to qualify existing and new requirements.

•	Virtual technical recruiter working primarily for San Francisco / Bay area technology companies on a variety of highly-sought after, competitive roles including: VP of Engineering, Director of Product Management, Director of Product Marketing, Technical Project Manager, Sales Engineers, System Engineers, Hardware Engineers, System Admins, Software Engineers, Front and Back-end Web Developers, DBA’s and Tech Support.•	Sourced locally and nationally to present qualified candidates for Executive, Director, Management, HR, Engineering, and IT positions both contract and perm.•	Conducted interviews, assisted managers with candidate selection, sourced passive candidates through the internet and other social networking avenues, responsible for presenting job offers and negotiating salary with candidates and clients.

summary: Experienced Sr. Technical Recruiter with extensive staffing experience for Corporate, National VMS and retail accounts.  Clients include small start-ups through Fortune 500 firms in the Web 2.0, Software, Hardware, and Manufacturing / Industrial space.  Extensive background in requirements analysis and definition, partnering with hiring managers and account managers to define competencies for specific roles while gaining an in-depth understanding of the client’s unique technical environments.  Consistently implement recruiting best practices in regards to deep sourcing techniques (web mining, flipsearch), social networking (Linkedin, Facebook and Google Plus), salary negotiation, closing and new hire follow-up.    Experience in recruiting for hard-to-find technologies such as: Information Security, Java/J2EE, C/C++, SQL, C#, .NET, Perl, Hadoop, Machine-Learning, Touch-screen, and Ruby on Rails.Specialties: Sourcing, Passive Candidate Generation, Candidate analysis and negotiation, Sales and Marketing, ITIL Service Desk - Incident Management
name: Erwin deGuzman
title: Recruiter / Sourcer / Headhunter
